name: License required; exemptions
text: (a)  Except as otherwise provided by law, no person shall practice the occupation of tattoo artist in this State either gratuitously or for pay, or shall announce oneself either publicly or privately as prepared or qualified to practice that occupation without having a valid unrevoked license to do so. 	(b)  Physicians holding a valid unrevoked license under chapter 453 or 460 are exempt from the requirements of this part. [L 1990, c 285, pt of §2; am L 1996, c 202, §7]
